text: Clive Pullen (born 18 October 1994) is a Jamaican athlete specialising in the triple jump. He represented his country at the 2016 Summer Olympics without qualifying for the final. His personal bests in the event are 16.90 metres outdoors (+1.9 m/s 2016) and 17.19 metres indoors (Fayetteville 2017). ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |-
